targets.query: select last("in_recovery_int") FROM "wal" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)

panels.description: Current Transaction Per Second + last 6h history

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("xact_commit"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(last("xact_rollback"), 1s) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: TPS

panels.description: Current Queries Per Second (>5min avg) + last 6h history

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1s) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ GROUP BY time(10m) fill(none)

panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Current (5min+ avg) query runtime + last 6h history. Requires pg_stat_statements extension and the "get_stat_statements" helper function  from  the "sql/metric_fetching_helpers" folder on the monitored DB

targets.query: select mean(q) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("total_time")) / non_negative_derivative(mean("calls")) as q FROM "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND "query" !~ /(?i)::int8[\s+]as[\s]+epoch_ns/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY queryid, time($__interval) fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Query runtime

targets.query: SELECT last("size_b")  - first("size_b") FROM "db_size" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)

panels.description: Based on a pure SQL  based estimate for fast results. Needs "get_table_bloat_approx_sql" helper. Re-check with "pgstattuple" if numbers look suspicious!

targets.query: SELECT mean("approx_table_bloat_b" ) FROM "table_bloat_approx_summary_sql" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)

panels.title: Approx Table Bloat

panels.description: Percentage of rows touched by queries that are actually returned to the client. Low numbers (< 10%) for an OLTP workload can hint at missing indexes

targets.query: SELECT  non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_fetched")) / non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_returned")) * 100 FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Tuples fetched vs returned

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_deleted"), $agg_interval) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_updated"), $agg_interval) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_inserted"), $agg_interval) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Tuple  ins. / upd. / del. statistics ($agg_interval avg. rate., log. scale)

targets.query: SELECT ( non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_read")))) * 100 FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)

SELECT (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_commit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback"))) * 100) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Shared Buffers hit ratio + Rollback ratio ($agg_interval avg.)

panels.description: Transactions per Second / Queries per Second

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("xact_commit"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(last("xact_rollback"), 1s) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1s) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)

panels.title: TPS / QPS

targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("xlog_location_b"), 1s) FROM "wal" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)

panels.description: Assumes get_stat_activity() helper for unprivileged monitoring roles

targets.query: SELECT mean("idle") FROM "backends" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Sessions by state ($agg_interval avg.)

panels.description: Requires according "metric fetching helpers" on the monitored server

targets.query: SELECT mean("load_5min") FROM "cpu_load" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)

select mean(runtime) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("total_time"), 1h) / non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1h) as runtime FROM "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND "query" !~ /(?i)::int8[\s]+as[\s]+epoch_ns/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY queryid, time($agg_interval) fill(none)) group by time($agg_interval) fill(none)

panels.title: CPU load + avg. query runtime ($agg_interval avg.)

targets.query: select sum(seq_scan) as seq_scan,  sum(idx_scan) as idx_scan from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("seq_scan"), $agg_interval) as seq_scan, non_negative_derivative(mean("idx_scan"), $agg_interval) as idx_scan FROM "table_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter AND table_size_b > 10000000 GROUP BY time($agg_interval), table_full_name fill(none)) GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Seq. / Idx. scans ($agg_interval avg., >10MB tables, log. scale)

panels.description: Appears when larger groupings / sortings don't fit into 'work_mem'

targets.query: SELECT mean(temp_bytes) as temp_bytes FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("temp_bytes", $agg_interval) as temp_bytes FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($agg_interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Temp bytes ($agg_interval avg.)

panels.content: Brought to you by:
